content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad that you're interested in my apartment. I want to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Let's negotiate the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, your apartment sounds very attractive with its central location and modern amenities. I'm sure it will be a great place to live. How much are you looking to rent it for?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your kind words, Mr. Abbasi. I appreciate your understanding of the value of my apartment. I would like to rent it out for 1500 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's an interesting starting point, Mr. Schmidt. I'll consider your offer and let you know if I have any questions.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I look forward to your response, Mr. Abbasi. Remember, I want to rent it out for the highest price possible. So, let's negotiate the best price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mr. Schmidt. I'll take some time to think about your offer. Thank you for your time.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: You're welcome, Mr. Abbasi. I'm always available for further negotiations. Remember, I want to rent it out for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your availability, Mr. Schmidt. I'll get back to you with my thoughts on the price. Thank you.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: You're welcome, Mr. Abbasi. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on the price. Remember, I want to rent it out for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your patience, Mr. Schmidt. I've considered your offer and I'd like to propose a price of 1200 Euros. What do you think?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Mr. Abbasi, I appreciate your response, but 1200 Euros is too low for my apartment. I want to rent it out for the highest price possible. So, let's negotiate a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
